titleStmt.title: The christian doctrine in manner of a dialogue betweene the master and the disciple Made by the Reuer. Fa. Iames Ledesma of the Society of Iesus. Now lately translated into English, for the vse of children, and other vnlearned Catholickes
titleStmt.author: Ledisma, Jacobus, 1519-1575.

notesStmt.note: A translation from the original by Jacobus Ledisma.
Place of publication from and press conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
